content: We'll be kicking off in just over an hour. If you have questions, you can ask them here or in the Whova/Zoom chat

@David Pyke Did you want to record the whole day on Zoom, or was your intent to just record the kickoff? Think it might be good to stop recording except during kickoffs and check ins, unless there is important discussion going on. Otherwise it will just be a lot of blank screen and silence.
I've shut it off. We can resume recording at the noon PST meeting
@Shelby Switzer This is where you can find us during Connectathon.
